content.rendered:
Directed by Deb Medhekar

Written by Rabindranath Tagore. Deb Medhekar. Radhika Anand. Sunil Doshi. Deb Medhekar

Cast Danny Denzongpa (Rehmat Khan). Geetanjali Thapa (Minnie Basu). Adil Hussain (Robi Basu). Tisca Chopra (Wahida). Brijendra Kala (Bhola). Ekavali Khanna (Shobita). Maya Sarao (Ghazala). Miraya Suri (Little Minnie). Prisha Dabbas (Rabiya). Sahra Khan Sahibi (Aryana). Simon Frenay (Michel). Shashi Bhushan (Bakht Rawan). Subroto Sarkar (Ikhtedaar Hussain). Sumit Sarkar (Lawyer). Shanu Verma (Lawyer’s Wife). Madhu Anand Chandhock (Grieving Mother). Mir Sarwar (Zadran). Chinmoy Das (Tapan Bhattacharyya). Varoon Varma (Man at SA Airlines (as Varun Verma)). Megh Pant (Militant Giant). Pushpendra Singh (Militant Leader). Bhavani Bashir Yasir (Cleric). Ishtiaq (Militant Boy). Ganesh Kumar (Chor Bazaar Salesman). Shoaib Lokhandwala (Angry Afghan Man). Ivan Rodrigues (Airline Spokesperson). Ritisha Vijayvargya (Ground Staff Woman). Aloke Sengupta (Cop 1). Amit Chakrabarty (Cop 2). A.R. Rama (Rafique). Ahmer Haider (Security Officer). Richard Bhakti Klein (Journalist (as R. Bhakti Klein)) . Mithun Debnath (Bangladeshi refugee). Mithun Debnath (Bangladeshi refugee). Imran Farooq Ganaie (Afghani inspector). Tanuj Kewalramani (Vaibhav). Faiz Khan (Rafique)

Language Hindi. English. Bengali. Dari

Producers Sunil Doshi. Shamim Khan. Rinchen Namgyal. Kaustubh Palav. Sandeep Rudra

Production Fox STAR Studio. Handmade Film. Alliance Media & Entertainment
